main event: A large spherical silvery object was observed moving in the sky near Morgantown, Pennsylvania on February 9, 1967.
interesting points: The object was first observed at approximately 7:00 PM and was visible for about 15 minutes., The estimated diameter of the object was approximately 1/4 mile., The object moved in a northeasterly direction at speeds between 100-300 mph., Initially, the object hovered before accelerating rapidly., The Air Force could not identify the object as any known aircraft or phenomenon.
witness description: No specific witnesses were named in the report.
